changeSet.author: irazin
changeSet.comment: Insert metrics for Signatera Plasma pipeline
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_statistics_type` (`description`, `name`, `applicability`) VALUES ('Assays with sufficient DOR', 'WORKING_ASSAYS', 'ALL'), ('Assays with efficient DOR', 'EFFICIENT_ASSAYS', 'ALL'), ('Assays with insuffcient DOR', 'DROPOUT_ASSAYS', 'ALL'), ('High quality amplicon reads', 'AMPLICON_READS', 'ALL');
INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_type` (`category`, `description`, `name`, `ismultisample`) VALUES ('SAMPLE', 'Efficient Assays', 'EFFICIENT_ASSAYS', 0);
